Type Method# buildBlock(_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
static func buildBlock<R0>(_ r0: R0) -> some ResolverSpecification where R0 : Resolver

```

Available when `Property` conforms to `_IntentValue`.## [See Also](/documentation/appintents/resolverspecificationbuilder/buildblock(_:)#see-also)
